name: The Tale Of Ulf
description:
How to play:

You run around with A, D.

You shoot your shotgun with F.

You use your axe with a left-click.

You can dash with the shift button.

You jump with space, you can even double jump.

Use doors with E.

Multiplayer:

How to connect to a multiplayer session:

Write your name, then connect to our servers. When you have connected, you can create or join a room. Click to join the room that your friend has created. Then the person that made the room can start the game by choosing easy, medium or hard difficulty.

Made by:

Programmers: Kevin Cevizovic, Edvin Stenmark, Joel Frannson.

Artists: Felix Johansson, Henrik Johansson, Freja Winehem and Felicia Ivarsson.

Music: Karl Bast and Anton Jansson.

We're all first-year students. So don't expect it to be good :)
